text: Father of the Bride is a 1950 American comedy movie. It was directed by Vincente Minnelli. It stars Spencer Tracy, Elizabeth Taylor, Joan Bennett, Don Taylor, Billie Burke, and Leo G. Caroll. It was released on June 16, 1950. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1950 romantic comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about weddings Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli
title: Father of the Bride (1950 movie)
